RAISING COMFORT TO THE HIGHEST LEVEL

Welcome to the Tattv Homestay

Tattv Homestay is located at a spectacular location, in the lap of Himalayas and delivers the boutique feel which will make you feel like you are in the mountain home which you always wanted. Situated just five minutes from Mall Road, it offers views of snow-capped mountains and is adjacent to the Beas River. The ideal mountain escape for all your mountain indulges! in the mountains. It’s located five minutes away from the mall road, looking over ice caped mountains right adjacent to the Beas river. It’s a perfect getaway for your mountain callings!

Boutique Inspired Living

The Ghar, Manali | Boutique Stay
5.0
Based on 32 reviews
review us on
Aashima Murarka
01:12 25 Jan 23
I stayed here for 2 days and can easily say that the Ghar is hands down one of the most beautiful property you will find in Manali (Vashist). The best part is that it offers all the luxuries one can think of and yet feels like home. From the amazing rooms, views from each and every window, the food, the outdoor space, everything is top notch.Coming to the owners, our very own Anunay and Brinda, they are really amazing hosts, super friendly and chill and will take care of you like your own.So I’d definitely recommend you staying at this gorgeous property and have the time of your life.PS: they have bunk beds too for all the solo travellers and yes do not miss out on having the most amazing coffee here :)❤️
Aaysha Vani Ahuja
18:46 23 Jan 23
This place as the name suggests is exactly like a ghar but with much more facilities than normal. 😁My experience here was absolutely amazing loved each and every corner of the property. The service, facilities, hygiene and the stay everything was absolutely phenomenal.It is a must visit when in Manali, accommodating here would be a great decision.
Meet Ramani
11:32 23 Jan 23
Really love this place. Best place in manali, top notch home made food & the ambiance of the home is epic 😍. The Ghar is located on mountain so view from here is heaven. Just stay here you guys never forgot thay day. Must try coffee 🤪😄
Dp Gallery
10:57 23 Jan 23
I loved the fact that the place was located in between mountains and what an amazing view it is from the property. no wonder it is a castle! There was peace and the service too was undoubtedly good.
Badal Duhoon
10:51 23 Jan 23
Such a Cozy and Amazing Place to stay in Manali…This place have the best view in ManaliBrinda Sharma and Anunay both are amazing personalities and Loved it
